data.title: Unbeatable.....
data.text: This is a wonderful place to eat Sushi. Great pricing and the sushi is very good. My wife and I eat there several times a month. We keep coming back.....and the owners are so pleasant. This is what I look for in a home town restaurant.

data.title: A regular stopping place
data.text: Been a regular customer since it opened and recommend to all. Run by a very nice Korean couple, it is not high brow flashy sushi. For a good basic and inexpensive sushi meal it is a great neighborhood place. Love their squid salad and $1 sake. Domestic brews are $1 or $1.50. Order one of their combos and a  roll or 2 and you've got a full dinner for 2 with drinks for under or just over $30! Can't be beat.

data.title: Want Sushi and a nice price
data.text: All kinds of sushi and sashimi...  you can feast and  have Sake and not lose your wallet...  It is highly recommended.... Very friendly!

data.title: Best local sushi
data.text: Me and my wife go here once a month and is a hidden gem right next to the Albertson's grocery store.  Very low key quiet sushi bar.  Their sushi and sashimi rolls are very delicious.  Our favorite is the volcano roll.  Hot sake is only a $1 and all the food is reasonably priced.  If you want to try an authentic sushi restaurant that is not over run with lots of people or noise you have to try Carrollton Sushi, also known as Chou Cho Sushi.  As always we will be back in March for our date night.

data.title: Carrollton sushi is fabulous. The restaurant has provides a simple, yet friendly and tranquil atmosphere.
data.text: Carrollton sushi is fabulous. The restaurant provides a simple yet inviting atmosphere. We love the monster roll.
